revised_title: Classification and Anatomy of Sclerodermic Zoantharia Genera
tldr: The author examines the classification and anatomy of the sclerodermic zoantharia genera Heterophyllia, Battersbyia, Palaeocyclus, and Asterosmilia. He discovers a new genus, Asterosmilia, that unites the Turbinolides and Astraeides divisions. The anatomy of Heterophyllia and Battersbyia is studied, and their species are described. Palaeocyclus is proven to be a vesiculo-tubulate coral genus, belonging to the Cyathophyllidae.
